last_episode_to_air.name: The Hand of Fate
last_episode_to_air.overview: To save Alex and the world, Shiny and Thunder will need to team up with Dr. Starface and Creed — and show off the strength of their brotherly bond.

name: Super Giant Robot Brothers!
overview: Two squabbling robot brothers battle bloodthirsty kaijus, supernatural disasters and mundane personal issues as they adapt to the trials of growing up.

episodes.name: Gone and Back Again
episodes.overview: After fighting his first monster, red robot Shiny blasts into space. But when he meets new bot Thunder on his return, he realizes things are different.

guest_stars.character: Jude Alpha / Ground Reporter Male / EDF Tank Crew 1 (voice)
guest_stars.name: Murphy Patrick Martin

guest_stars.character: Penny Alpha / Female News Anchor / EDF Female Moon Crew (voice)
guest_stars.name: Jeanine Meyers

episodes.name: Welcome to G.R.I.T.S.
episodes.overview: Battling vicious kaiju is only for the bravest. So Thunder brings Shiny back to the base, where young inventor Alex and Colonel Creed test his skills.

episodes.name: Put Me in, Coach
episodes.overview: Shiny's out to prove he has what it takes to fight with Thunder. After Shiny shows his moves, Alex gives him a shot with his own solo mission.

episodes.name: Upgrades
episodes.overview: Tired of being under Thunder's shadow, Shiny enlists the help of tech savvy Sarge to level up his fighting skills against the terrorizing kaiju.

episodes.name: Inner Space
episodes.overview: When kaiju mites attack Shiny and Thunder, Alex and Creed must call on the extermination team. Meanwhile, an alien spy breaks into their headquarters.

episodes.name: Road Trip
episodes.overview: Shiny and Thunder head to the other side of the planet to battle a two-headed kaiju. But the spy tries to sabotage the mission and take over the base.

episodes.name: Boybotfriend
episodes.overview: Alex starts to crush on an alien teen genius who crash-lands on Earth after a kaiju battle. But Shiny, Thunder and Creed question his intentions.

episodes.name: Whack-a-bot
episodes.overview: Vanessa the spy sends off a signal that summons ancient kaiju to spring up from their underground hibernation and start chaos in multiple cities.

episodes.name: Defying Gravity, Bro
episodes.overview: Shiny reveals a clue that helps Alex begin to locate her parents. Vanessa and her alien overlord decide to accelerate their destructive aerial plans.

episodes.name: The Hand of Fate
episodes.overview: To save Alex and the world, Shiny and Thunder will need to team up with Dr. Starface and Creed — and show off the strength of their brotherly bond.
